entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as crying weakly into the back of Millicent Bulstrode's robes. She is also referred to as 'Little Miss Question-All' by Umbridge.

entities.name: millicent bulstrode
entities.description: Millicent Bulstrode is described as having Hermione against the wall and trying to squash her. She is also referred to as 'looking disgusted'.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is described as looking triumphant and seizing Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as shouting through his gag.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is staring at Hermione as though she had never seen her before.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is gazing at Hermione too.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry has just noticed something about Hermione.

relationships.description: Millicent Bulstrode is trying to squash Hermione against the wall.
